class.name: GPUParticlesAttractorSphere3D
class.description: Ellipse-shaped 3D particle attractor affecting [GPUParticles3D] nodes. [b]Note:[/b] Particle attractors only affect [GPUParticles3D], not [CPUParticles3D].

members.member: The attractor sphere's radius in 3D units. [b]Note:[/b] Stretched ellipses can be obtained by using non-uniform scaling on the [GPUParticlesAttractorSphere3D] node.
